promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word name for a chibi young simple spider fighting-type pokemon with stone wings. It can be found in canyon-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, fighting or spider. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Petrognite, a a chibi young simple spider fighting-type pokemon. It can be found in canyon-like environments It has the following abilities: Spirited Throw. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "spider", "fighting" or "Petrognite". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of fighting-type pokemon, spider-like, simple, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, orange and blue ambient lighting
generatedDescription: Often found traversing chasm walls, this plucky pebble-covered critter uses its Spirited Throw skill to pitch rocks at foes, emulating a youthful champion.
